DOC.brief_summary: Prospective , single-center , single-blind , randomize , control , two-arm , interventional study .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Women least 18 year old time inform consent . 2 . Able understand voluntarily sign Informed Consent form approve relevant Independent Ethics Committee ( IEC ) govern site . 3 . First second fresh Assisted Reproductive Technology ( ART ) cycle attempt ( since last successful implantation , ) . 4 . Eligible elective SET fresh embryo Day 2/3 . Elective SET define transfer one embryo morphological ( `` best '' ) category select embryo . 1 . Presence history ovarian endometriotic cyst . 2 . Presence history diagnose severe endometriosis ( i.e . stage IV revise American Fertility Society classification endometriosis ) . 3 . Hormonal , functional , anatomical and/or abnormality potentially increase risk miscarriage and/or ectopic pregnancy judge Investigator determine medical history clinical laboratory . This include , limited , uncontrolled diabetes mellitus , uncontrolled thyroid disease , alcoholism , drug abuse , abnormal uterine cavity etc . 4 . History two consecutive miscarriage . 5 . Known history human immunodeficiency virus , Hepatitis C virus and/or Hepatitis B virus infection . 6 . The subject serious acute condition , Investigator 's opinion , would preclude participation study . 7 . Need preimplantation genetic diagnosis/screening . 8 . Use timelapse embryo imaging . 9 . Participating oocyte donation procedure . 10 . Participation interventional drug clinical investigation within 2 month prior screen . 11 . Dependency sponsor investigator ( e.g . coworker family member ) .
